item.title: Only 1 in 5 Americans support US effort to acquire Greenland, poll finds

item.title: Trump issues stern warning to NATO ahead of Vance's high-stakes Greenland meeting
item.description: President Donald Trump warned NATO that the U.S. needs Greenland for national security, saying that Russia or China would take it otherwise.
